contextId.information: This can be stated in positive form. AT: "they will not leave for my husband name or descendant" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
contextId.quote: they will leave for my husband neither name nor descendant

contextId.information: This means that only if David went would his soldiers remain with him. AT: "only if you go will any of your men remain with you" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
contextId.quote: if you do not go, not one man will remain with you

contextId.information: This can be stated in a positive form. AT: "I will only offer ... something that I have paid for" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
contextId.quote: I will not offer ... anything that costs me nothing
